original_text: He considered that God was able even to raise him from the dead, from which, figuratively speaking, he did receive him back.
korean_text: 그가 하나님이 능히 이삭을 죽은 자 가운데서 다시 살리실 줄로 생각한지라 비유컨대 그를 죽은 자 가운데서 도로 받은 것이니라

sentences.original_text: that God was able even to raise him from the dead
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 죽은 자 가운데서도 그를 살리실 수 있음을

sentences.original_text: from which he did receive him back
